snippet: A leaked document assessing a journalist’s work sent the Cuomo administration into damage-control mode.
abstract: Web site Buzzfeed publishes leaked compendium of blog posts by journalist Liz Benjamin of the YNN cable network that the New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo administration finds offensive or inaccurate; document, compiled by a top Cuomo aide before a meeting with YNN managers, highlights administration's sensitivity to news media criticism.
lead_paragraph: A leaked document assessing a journalist’s work sent the Cuomo administration into damage-control mode.

headline.seo: Document by Cuomo Aide Shows Governor’s Views on Press
headline.main: How Does Press Irk Cuomo? Document Offers Clues
headline.print_headline: How Does Press Irk Cuomo? A Document Provides Clues
